sqlQuery.name: Organism
sqlQuery.sql:
-- PlasmoDB SELECT 'Pb' as term, '%berghei%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pc' as term, '%chabaudi%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pfa' as term, '%falciparum 3D7%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pfi' as term, '%falciparum IT%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pk' as term, '%knowlesi%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Py' as term, 'Plasmodium yoelii yoelii 17XNL' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'PyYM' as term, 'Plasmodium yoelii yoelii YM' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pv' as term, 'P%vivax%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Pcyn' as term, 'Plasmodium cynomolgi strain B' as internal from dual UNION
-- GiardiaDB SELECT 'Giardia' as term, 'Giardia%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Assemblage A isolate WB' as term, 'Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Assemblage B isolate GS' as term, 'Giardia Assemblage B isolate GS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Assemblage E isolate P15' as term, 'Giardia Assemblage E isolate P15' as internal from dual UNION
-- AmoebaDB SELECT 'Ent' as term, 'Entamoeba%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Entamoeba histolytica HM-1:IMSS' as term, 'Entamoeba histolytica HM-1:IMSS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Entamoeba dispar SAW760' as term, 'Entamoeba dispar SAW760' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Entamoeba invadens IP1' as term, 'Entamoeba invadens IP1' as internal from dual UNION
-- MicrosporidiaDB SELECT 'Micr' as term, 'En%zoon %' as internal from dual UNION
SELECT 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC1' as term, 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC2' as term, 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC2' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC3' as term, 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi EC3' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi GB-M1' as term, 'Encephalitozoon cuniculi GB-M1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon hellem ATCC 50504' as term, 'Encephalitozoon hellem ATCC 50504' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon hellem Swiss' as term, 'Encephalitozoon hellem Swiss' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Encephalitozoon intestinalis ATCC 50506' as term, 'Encephalitozoon intestinalis ATCC 50506' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Enterocytozoon bieneusi H348' as term, 'Enterocytozoon bieneusi H348' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Nematocida parisii ERTm1' as term, 'Nematocida parisii ERTm1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Nematocida parisii ERTm3' as term, 'Nematocida parisii ERTm3' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Nematocida sp. 1 ERTm2' as term, 'Nematocida sp. 1 ERTm2' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Nosema ceranae BRL01' as term, 'Nosema ceranae BRL01' as internal from dual UNION
-- PiroplasmaDB SELECT 'Babesia bovis T2Bo' as term, 'Babesia bovis T2Bo' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Theileria parva strain Muguga' as term, 'Theileria parva strain Muguga' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Theileria annulata strain Ankara' as term, 'Theileria annulata strain Ankara' as internal from dual UNION
SELECT 'Gl' as term,'%lamblia%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Ch' as term, '%hominis%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Cm' as term, '%muris%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Cp' as term, '%Iowa%' as internal from dual UNION
-- TrichDB SELECT 'Tv' as term, '%vaginalis%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Tv' as term, 'Trichomonas vaginalis%' as internal from dual UNION
-- ToxoDB SELECT 'Tg' as term, 'Toxoplasma gondii%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Tg_gt1' as term, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Tg_me49' as term, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Tg_veg' as term, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Tg_rh' as term, 'Toxoplasma gondii RH' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Nc' as term, 'Neospora caninum' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Et' as term, 'Eimeria tenella str. Houghton' as internal from dual UNION
-- CryptoDB SELECT 'Cryptosporidium' as term, 'Cryptosporidium %' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium parvum Iowa II' as term, 'Cryptosporidium parvum Iowa II%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium hominis' as term, 'Cryptosporidium hominis TU502' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Cryptosporidium muris' as term, 'Cryptosporidium muris RN66' as internal from dual UNION
-- TriTrypDB SELECT 'Leishmania braziliensis' as term, 'Leishmania braziliensis' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Leishmania infantum' as term, 'Leishmania infantum' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Leishmania major' as term, 'Leishmania major strain Friedlin' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Leishmania mexicana' as term, 'Leishmania mexicana' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma brucei' as term, 'Trypanosoma brucei%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma brucei Lister strain 427' as term, 'Trypanosoma brucei Lister strain 427' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma brucei TREU927' as term, 'Trypanosoma brucei TREU927' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma brucei gambiense' as term, 'Trypanosoma brucei gambiense' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Leishmania tarentolae Parrot-TarII' as term, 'Leishmania tarentolae Parrot-TarII' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma cruzi' as term, 'Trypanosoma cruzi%' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Esmeraldo-like' as term,'Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Esmeraldo-like' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Non-Esmeraldo-like' as term, 'Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener Non-Esmeraldo-like' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener' as term, 'Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma congolense' as term, 'Trypanosoma congolense' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Trypanosoma vivax' as term, 'Trypanosoma vivax' as internal from dual UNION
-- FungiDB SELECT 'acla' as term, 'Aspergillus clavatus NRRL 1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'afla' as term, 'Aspergillus flavus NRRL3357' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'afum' as term, 'Aspergillus fumigatus Af293' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'anid' as term, 'Aspergillus nidulans FGSC A4' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'anig' as term, 'Aspergillus niger ATCC 1015' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'ater' as term, 'Aspergillus terreus NIH2624' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'calb' as term, 'Candida albicans SC5314' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cimmh5' as term, 'Coccidioides immitis H538.4' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cimmrs' as term, 'Coccidioides immitis RS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'tmes' as term, 'Tremella mesenterica DSM 1558' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cneo_neo_je' as term, 'Cryptococcus neoformans var. neoformans JEC21' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cneo_neo_b' as term, 'Cryptococcus neoformans var. neoformans B-3501A' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cgat_wm' as term, 'Cryptococcus gattii WM276' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cgat_r' as term, 'Cryptococcus gattii R265' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'cneo_grubii' as term, 'Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'fgra' as term, 'Gibberella zeae PH-1' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'foxy' as term, 'Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici 4287' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'fver' as term, 'Gibberella moniliformis 7600' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'mory' as term, 'Magnaporthe oryzae 70-15' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'nfis' as term, 'Neosartorya fischeri NRRL 181' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'NcraOR74A' as term, 'Neurospora crassa OR74A' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'pgra' as term, 'Puccinia graminis f. sp. tritici CRL 75-36-700-3' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'rory' as term, 'Rhizopus oryzae RA 99-880' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'ScerS288c' as term, 'Saccharomyces cerevisiae S288c' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'spom' as term, 'Schizosaccharomyces pombe 972h-' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Ndis8579' as term, 'Neurospora discreta FGSC 8579' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Ntet2508A' as term, 'Neurospora tetrasperma FGSC 2508' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'hara' as term, 'Hyaloperonospora arabidopsidis Emoy2' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'smac' as term, 'Sordaria macrospora k-hell' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'physo' as term, 'Phytophthora sojae' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'phyra' as term, 'Phytophthora ramorum' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'phyca' as term, 'Phytophthora capsici LT1534' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'phyin' as term, 'Phytophthora infestans T30-4' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'pytul' as term, 'Pythium ultimum DAOM BR144' as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: Species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct species AS term, species AS internal FROM ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes
